# Sourced from FundyPhytoPhysCodeChunks
ScientificTen <- function(x, sf = 2) {
  x <- as.numeric(x)
  if (is.na(x)) {
    return("NA")
  }
  
  y <- format(signif(x, sf), scientific = TRUE) %>% as.character()
  z <- str_split(y, pattern = "e")[[1]]
  
  base <- z[1]
  exponent <- as.numeric(z[2])
  
  if (is.na(exponent)) {
    return("NA")
  }
  
  if (abs(exponent) > 3) {
    return(paste(base, "Ã— 10^", exponent, "^", sep = ""))
  } else {
    return(signif(x, sf))
  }
}
